item.title: Delicious finally updates its Firefox Extension
item.description: Delicious, that’s delicious.com or del.icio.us for those old enough - has finally updated its Firefox extension - though it is still a beta version, the updated extension is available in the Mozilla Add-ons applet-store

item.title: Delicious - I still love you
item.description: Delicious, that’s delicious.com or del.icio.us for those who can remember it - is one of the original web 2.
